title: Switchboards
fullText:
A switchboard or switchboards shall be provided in or on the relocatable unit for the mounting or the enclosure of switchgear and protective devices in accordance with AS/NZS 3000.
Switchboards installed externally shall be a minimum of IP55.
A label shall be installed on or adjacent to the switchboard, identifying all wiring systems located within the connectable electrical installation, for example:
WARNING â€” THE INSTALLATION CONTAINS LOW VOLTAGE (230V), AND EXTRA LOW VOLTAGE WIRING SYSTEMS. REFER TO THE OWNER'S MANUAL.
